name: Paragliding Complete Course
description: An easy, fun and safe paragliding course. Our Paragliding Complete Course is aligned with international standards of APPI (Association of Paragliding Pilots and instructors ) , an international organization based in Switzerland that validate licenses worldwide. The course aims to learn to paraglide by yourself in all types of flight : in sand dunes, cliffs and mountains. Therefore, the course consists of 12 lessons divided into 4 modules: low-altitude flights , high altitude flights, ground control and theories.
